code: import axios from'axios';import*as constants from"./constants";export var changeDetail=function changeDetail(title,content,imageUrl,username){return{type:constants.CHANGE_DETAIL,title:title,content:content,imageUrl:imageUrl,username:username};};export var changeDetailEditStatusAction=function changeDetailEditStatusAction(editStatus){return{type:constants.CHANGE_DETAIL_EDIT_STATUS,editStatus:editStatus};};export var getDetail=function getDetail(id){return function(dispatch){axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;axios.get("http://35.229.221.230:3000/comment/detail?id="+id).then(function(response){var result=response.data.data;console.log(result);dispatch(changeDetail(result.title,result.content,result.imageUrl,result.username));});};};export var editArticle=function editArticle(id,content){return function(dispatch){axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;axios.post("http://35.229.221.230:3000/comment/update",{_id:id,content:content}).then(function(response){var result=response.data.data;console.log(result);dispatch(changeDetail(result.title,result.content,result.imageUrl,result.username));});};};
